root.SourceConnectionString: Data Source = PC201506031349;Initial Catalog = DB3;Integrated Security = SSPI;
root.TargetConnectionString: Data Source = PC201506031349;Initial Catalog = DB3;Integrated Security = SSPI;
root.SelectQuery: SELECT [MAIN_ID],CONVERT(varchar, [DEAL_TIME], 111 ) as DEAL_TIME,[DEAL_COUNT],[IS_VALID],[GOODS_CASH],[MANAGE_FEE] FROM [HISTORY_SETTLE_DEAL_MAIN] where DEAL_TIME>=@startDate and DEAL_TIME<@endDate;
